name: Shin
description:
Shin is the owner of well known dojo and the older cousin of Hibiki. They both run the dojo that inherited by Shin's father and teach some students the art of sword. He has a phobia with fire, since his wife was killed in fire that ignited by 'a young man with white hair' in his house 3 years ago. Later on, Shin and Hibiki found a dying girl in the midst of winter storm, then that amnesiac girl was named Hotaru, which will change their peaceful lives forever...

Format, JPG 1080x1080
